QuestData.Title: Last of Her Kind
QuestData.Description: Obsidia is one of the last mature dragons that can continue the black dragonflight bloodline. She must be killed.$B$BIf you succeed in killing her, you should inform Lirastrasza immediately of your victory. She's been fighting a long time to see this done.$B$BThank you for being our fang in these battles. You've proven a powerful ally.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One of the last breeding black dragons in all of Azeroth.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lirastrasza just northwest of the Obsidian Forest in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: You killed Obsidia within her own lair? Impressive, $r. I'm sorry that I could not be there.$B$BYou're true to your word, and you most certainly have the bite to back your bellow. Thank you.
